description: This table contains hospital liability bucket information from the Hospital Liability Buckets (HLB) master file. This table does not include information for pre-allocated HLB records that are not yet in use.

columns.name: BUCKET_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the liability bucket.

columns.name: BUCKET_NAME
columns.description: The name of the liability bucket.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account to which the liability bucket is linked.

columns.name: BKT_TYPE_HA_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of the liability bucket. 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Prebilled


Primary Claim


Secondary Claim


Self-Pay


Bad Debt


Interim Primary Claim


Interim Secondary Claim


Undistributed


Home Health RAP


Secondary Home Health RAP


Hospice Election


Secondary Hospice Election


Informational


Homing

columns.name: CLAIM_TYPE_HA_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of claim associated with the liability bucket.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


New Claim


Late Replacement Claim


Late Charge Claim


Late Write Off


Supplemental Payment Claim

columns.name: BKT_STS_HA_C_NAME
columns.description:
The status of the liability bucket.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Created


Queued


Processed


Printed


Outstanding


Error


Closed


Rejected


Replaced

columns.name: CLOSE_REASON_HA_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reason why the liability bucket was closed.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Transferred


Zero Balance


Replaced


Late Write-Off


RAP Canceled


No Part B Charges


Alternate Payor Charges Only


SNF Part B Charges Only


SNF Non-Covered Part A


Informational Claim Accepted

columns.name: COVERAGE_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the coverage associated with the liability bucket.

columns.name: PAYOR_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the payer associated with the liability bucket.

columns.name: PAYOR_ID_PAYOR_NAME
columns.description: The name of the payor.

columns.name: BENEFIT_PLAN_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the benefit plan associated with the liability bucket.

columns.name: BENEFIT_PLAN_ID_BENEFIT_PLAN_NAME
columns.description: The name of the benefit plan record.

columns.name: CURRENT_BALANCE
columns.description: The current balance on the liability bucket.

columns.name: PREVIOUS_CREDITS
columns.description: The total monetary amount of credits on buckets from which liability was transferred to the bucket in question.

columns.name: CHARGE_TOTAL
columns.description: The total monetary amount of charges on the liability bucket.

columns.name: PAYMENT_TOTAL
columns.description: The total monetary amount of payments on the liability bucket.

columns.name: ADJUSTMENT_TOTAL
columns.description: The total monetary amount of adjustments on the liability bucket.

columns.name: NEXT_RESP_AMT
columns.description: The amount of liability that was transferred from this liability bucket to another bucket.

columns.name: SERV_AREA_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the service area associated with the liability bucket.

columns.name: INTERIM_START_DATE
columns.description: For an interim liability bucket, the billing start date. The first charge service date that is included in the bucket.

columns.name: INTERIM_END_DATE
columns.description: For an interim liability bucket, the billing end date. The last charge service date that is included in the bucket.

columns.name: INTERIM_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
For an interim liability bucket, the interim bucket type. Choices are First Claim, Middle Claim, and Last Claim.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


First Claim


Middle Claim


Last Claim

columns.name: LAST_CLAIM_DATE
columns.description: The date of the last claim for the liability bucket.

columns.name: PMT_DIST_COMP_YN
columns.description:
This column stores whether payment distribution is complete.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: EXP_NA_WOFF_AMT
columns.description: This column stores the expected not-allowed write-off amount.

columns.name: ACT_NA_WOFF_AMT
columns.description: This column stores the actual not-allowed write-off amount.

columns.name: CURR_AUTO_WO_TX_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the current auto write-off transaction.

columns.name: RVSE_AUTO_WO_TX_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the automatic write-off transaction's reversal on the liability bucket.

columns.name: WO_ADJ_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column stores the write-off adjustment status.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No Expected W/O, No Actual W/O


Expected W/O done, No Actual W/O


No Expected W/O, Actual W/O done


Expected W/O = Actual W/O


Expected W/O <> Actual W/O

columns.name: MDCRE_B_CLM_FLG_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates that the charges in the liability bucket should be submitted for Medicare part B claims processing.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes - Part A Exhausted


Yes - Part B Only

columns.name: CLAIM_FORM_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The form type of the last claim on the bucket.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


CMS Claim


UB Claim


State Visit Data


State Visit Provider Data


Vektis Claim


Pharmacy Claim

columns.name: EXTERN_AR_FLAG_YN
columns.description:
External A/R Flag. This flag determines if an bucket's balance is to be counted as belonging to an external agency.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Active AR


External Agency AR


Bad Debt


Outsourced

columns.name: BAD_DEBT_FLAG_YN
columns.description:
Bad Debt Flag. This flag determines if a bucket's balance is to be counted as belonging to a bad debt agency.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: EXTERN_AR_FLAG_YN

columns.name: PYR_RCVD_DATE
columns.description: This column stores the date on which the latest claim for the associated liability bucket was received by a payer.

columns.name: FST_PYR_RCVD_DATE
columns.description: This column stores the date on which the first claim for the associated liability bucket was received by a payer.

columns.name: WO_CPTN_TX_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the transaction used to write off non-covered charges using a system action.

columns.name: LEVEL_OF_CARE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number of the patient's Level of Care on the interim bill start date associated with this bucket.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: USE_EXIST_DATA_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the claims processor should use data from an existing claim when resubmitting or demanding a new claim.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: ALT_PAY_YN
columns.description:
This column stores whether this bucket resulted from alternate payer routing logic. Yes - It is an alternate payer; No - It is not an alternate payer; " - Not been evaluated, status unknown.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: USE_EXIST_DATA_YN

columns.name: EXPECTED_REIMB_CMT
columns.description: Stores the expected reimbursement comment

columns.name: SURCHARGE_HTR_ID
columns.description: Stores the current transaction for the surcharge.

columns.name: COPAY_AMOUNT
columns.description: Total current copay due on the bucket as specified by last payment on the insurance bucket or last user override.

columns.name: COINS_AMOUNT
columns.description: Total current coinsurance due on the bucket as specified by last payment on the insurance bucket or last user override.

columns.name: DEDUCTIBLE_AMOUNT
columns.description: Total current deductible due on the bucket as specified by last payment on the insurance bucket or last user override.

columns.name: NON_COVERED_AMT
columns.description: Total current non covered due on the bucket as specified by last payment on the insurance bucket or last user override.

columns.name: USER_COMMENT
columns.description: This column stores the comment the user entered when overriding self-pay explanation of benefits (EOB) information.

columns.name: XR_BILLED_AMOUNT
columns.description: Stores the expected reimbursement billed amount. It is the billed amount of the claim where the expected reimbursement is calculated.
